img_text: My boyfriend was dying. I was by his bedside when he said in a weak voice, "There's something I must confess. "Shhh" I said, "There's nothing to confess. Everything is alright." "No I must die in peace" he said, "I had sex with your sister, your best friend, and a co-worker." "I know" I whispered, "That's why I poisoned you... now close your eyes.
